data.description:
In the depths of a mysterious research facility known only as "M.A.Z.E," players are thrust into a chilling virtual reality experience unlike any other. This horror Gorilla Tag fangame beckons adventurers to navigate through its labyrinthine corridors, each twist and turn shrouded in darkness and dread.

As players step into the virtual realm, they find themselves ensnared within the sinister confines of M.A.Z.E. Led by a team of scientists with dubious intentions, players must unravel the secrets hidden within M.A.Z.E's walls while evading the clutches of a monstrous entity lurking in the shadows.

The atmosphere is thick with tension as players navigate through dimly lit passages. With each step forward, the sense of impending doom looms ever closer, driving players deeper into the heart of darkness.

M.A.Z.E is a battle of wits against the unknown. Players must solve intricate puzzles, uncover cryptic clues, and outmaneuver cunning adversaries to survive. But beware, for every victory brings them one step closer to the chilling truth lurking at the heart of M.A.Z.E.

The gameplay is immersive and intense, with players utilizing stealth, strategy, and quick reflexes to outsmart their foes and escape the clutches of impending doom. With each encounter, the tension mounts, building to heart-pounding crescendos that will leave players on the edge of their seats.
